Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Extends eligibility for real property tax exemptions to veterans who served on a submarine or on classified missions during a period of war
Summary: Extends eligibility for real property tax exemptions to veterans who served on a submarine or on classified missions during a period of war as documented by military service records.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to real property tax exemptions for veterans
